channel.title: CVE Feed for B&R -- SiteManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for B&R -- SiteManager

item.title: CVE-2020-11641|2024-09-17T04:28:49.241Z -- b%26r -- sitemanager
item.description: A local file inclusion vulnerability in B&R SiteManager versions <9.2.620236042 allows authenticated users to read sensitive files from SiteManager instances.

item.title: CVE-2020-11642|2024-09-17T01:11:16.044Z -- b%26r -- sitemanager
item.description: The local file inclusion vulnerability present in B&R SiteManager versions <9.2.620236042 allows authenticated users to impact availability of SiteManager instances.
